document.full_text: fish claimed the top u.s. spot for the first time wednesday by reaching the semifinals of the sony ericsson open when he beat no. 6 seed david ferrer 7-5, 6-2.
document.title: fish wins in key biscayne and earns no. 1 ranking
lines_and_colors: fish claimed the top u.s. spot for the first time wednesday by reaching the semifinals of the sony ericsson open when he beat no. 6 seed david ferrer 7-5, 6-2.
